quote: If you're alone... if it's just your life, you can use it however you please/ Wear yourself out, get cut to ribbons, doesn't matter. But when there's two, the blade grows heavy. Fighting like death doesn't concern you becomes a thing of the past. It's no longer just you. I threw away my way of life, relied on the strength of others, and somehow pushed on.
name: Guts

quote: Every phenomenon that happens in the human world is caused by people for their own convenience.
name: Takano Miyo

quote: The scars that you can't see are the hardest to heal.
name: Nao Tomori

quote: You can run from your past all you want, but it will always follow you. Forever and ever and ever and ever.
name: Izaya Orihara

quote: Having too many bonds causes one to lose focus, weakening their strongest wish, their greatest desire.
name: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.
name: Obito Uchiha

quote: There are times like that music can convey more than words.
name: Kunio Yaobi

quote: Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship.
name: Shino Aburame

quote: Freedom is something that you need to actively acquire. It's not something that's given with no strings attached. To be free means to take responsibility, and to prepare yourself for what's to come.
name: Charles Beams

quote: All people are nothing but tools. It doesn't matter how it's done. It doesn't matter what needs to be sacrificed. In this world, winning is everything. As long as I win in the end...That's all that matters.
anime: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e
name: Kiyotaka Ayanokouji

quote: Evil expects evil from others.
name: Osamu Dazai

quote: It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.
name: All Might

quote: Humans are creatures that always get hurt and feel regret whenever they make a choice on something.
anime: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
name: Glenn Radars

quote: This epidemic leads innocent people to their deaths, and yet it's pathogen will never be eradicated. This is a disease called serenity, a form of death that people have wished for.
name: Rikako Oryo

quote: A sword wields no strength, unless the hand that holds it has courage.
name: Link

quote: Things would have been so much better back then... If we had heard each other's voices. I hate myself. I was selfish, and I never thought about anyone else's feelings. Since then, my classmates have all looked down on me. I've lived for seventeen years, and I haven't lived one of them as a good person. The only time I heard your voice was when we got into that fight. And what pisses me off the most is the fact that I haven't changed at all since back then! But.,. But now, I think I can understand what you were saying... Nishimiya. Me and you... Can we be... friends? Shit!! I went way too far!! I was just gonna apologize and get out of here! Why the hell did I end up asking her to be friends?... Why did I even say that?! Jeez, that's so embarrassing! How can you even say that?
name: Shouya Ishida

quote: Just your touch... gets me excited. It makes me so happy. But those feelings will all turn into pain. The happier I am now, the more it'll hurt. I know how cruel this is... but no matter how hard I try, I can't rid myself of this. Nejima-kun... I... don't know... what love is.
name: Takasaki Misaki

quote: *to Jyugo* You're such a gloomy Gus, aren't you? You're so gloomy, indecisive, and so pessimistic. You're also dull, have bad handwriting, can't learn, insensitive, weak, a slow runner, a poor talker, and a poor liar. You really can't do anything other than break out of jail. Also you have short legs. But... that means you have lots of character traits, right? That's all you need to know for now, don't you think? If you don't know something, we'll teach you. We're gonna make your life more fun. It doesn't matter whether we're in jail or hell. If we live happily, we win. So let's take it slow and make sure you'll enjoy tomorrow.
name: Uno

quote: Back then, if we could have have heard each other's voices, everything would have been so much better.
name: Shouya Ishida

quote: Even though you like someone already, your partner is decided for you... and you can't do anything about that crush. Because everyone keeps getting in the way... and saying you can't... But... when you're the one in love... the only thing that feels true... is that feeling.
name: Nejima Yukari

quote: There's more to a real man than just his good looks!
name: Uno

quote: If I'm going to disappear no matter what, I at least want to leave them having fun and smiling.
name: Yoake Ryou

quote: If you take someone at puberty, a teen... introduce him or her to a member of the opposite sex around the same age and say, "This is the person who was meant for you"... and then go on to spend a lot of time together... why wouldn't you fall for them?
name: Nisaka Yuusuke

quote: I want you to please understand the scales of my heart will always be swaying back and forth. But there is something you should know. I will never lean to one side or the other due to the weight of gold coins.
name: Horo

quote: Even though everything is going to disappear, it isn't supposed to be meaningless. It's exactly because you know you're going to part ways, that now and only now is your only chance.
name: Onoya An

quote: I don't really want you to understand... I just don't want you to be like, 'Oh, is that all'? I don't need people to get it. These feelings... are important to me, and they're just for me.
name: Takasaki Misaki

quote: It's a programmer's job to make the most of limited resources to turn an impractical idea into reality.
name: Akasaka Ryuunosuke

quote: Making sure I have no regrets... that would just be self-serving, nothing more. It's all right. I mean, this is a great memory in itself, right?
name: Maiko Shuu

quote: There are things I don't want to forget... Memories of time spent with friends. Memories of time spent with her alone. Memories are important. But there's something even more important... That's to continue making memories.
name: Yūki Hase

quote: I have no fear of watching you grow old while I remain young. I'll even watch you on your death bed. I am no stranger to death. But your heart is like that of an innocent child. It has always accepted everything about me, without hesitation. Because of that I am very afraid.
name: Horo

quote: I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them, and then complains about someone "not being a man" when it's convenient.
anime: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
name: Kazuma Satou

quote: But... If you're the kind of person who can devote herself like that to someone, then I'll bet you anything there's someone out there who'll fall in love with you.
name: Ichijou Raku

quote: Yeah, if I saw her smiling to herself while reading this, I might think it was creepy. But there's something wrong with people who talk trash and laugh behind another's back, too.
name: Shougo Kiryuu

quote: Stop pouting! You learned something valuable. Remember the lesson, not the disappointment.
name: Horo

quote: You're right. Whether I ever see that girl again or not, that doesn't change the fact that this promise is important to me. I'm gonna go on treasuring it.
name: Ichijou Raku

quote: Lies are told prevent yourself from getting hurt.
name: Kamiyama

quote: I believe that there's not a single person whose heart is evil.
name: Kanzaki Nao

quote:
What is love?
Its when your eyes start following someone, and you look for them if they’re not around. You get excited thinking you might run into him when you’re putting your shoes on in the morning. And when you don’t it’s a little disappointing. But then you pass by him and that makes you happy for the rest of the day. It feels like you can handle anything. Seeing him is enough to make you happy.
name: Takasaki Misaki

quote: I do not want to wake from my dream and discover that I am all alone. I am tired of being alone! I do not want to be cold! I do not want to be lonely!
name: Horo

quote: People don't fall in love based on looks. And that's a scientific fact.
name: Ichijou Kagetsu

quote: The ones who accomplish something are the fools who keep pressing onward. The ones who accomplish nothing are the wise who cease advancing.
anime: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
name: Celica Arfonia

quote: I am Horo the Wise Wolf, and I am a very proud wolf.
name: Horo

quote: Just walk the path you believe in. And don't forget, you're the main character of your own life story!
anime: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
name: Glenn Radars

quote: I am not so grand, not as a god. I am Horo, and Horo is all that I am.
name: Horo

quote: To hell with living a life of revenge, I'm me! I live for myself! You're not my sworn enemy or anything else. You're nothing but a putrid demon!
name: Favaro Leone

quote: Explosion!!!
anime: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
name: Megumin

quote: The only one who can decide your worth.. is you. If you want to earn something, you need to reach out for it. Pro-athletes give up their teenage years to train. Business owners put up collateral to borrow money. That's how it always works. To make your ambitions come true, you have to take risks. The larger the ambition the greater the risk. That might involve time or enough work to affect your lifespan... So make your choice. Live in peace as a wannabe or risk losing it all to reach the very top. You're the one who needs to decide.
name: Jabami Yumeko

quote: Who'd want to date girls that talk smack about your friends?
name: Makoto Sunakawa

quote: I have so many things I want to say, so many things I want to ask you, but... When I see your face... None of that matters anymore!
name: Esdeath

quote: The amount of money one owns ultimately decides the victor. This doesn't stop within the walls of a casino, or it's cash flow. It's a rule that forms the basis for a capitalist society!
name: Jabami Yumeko

quote: The lifespan of a human is certainly way too short. That's why you've got to make the most of it and live your life to the fullest.
name: Leone

quote: It's true that you're lacking in ability. That's because you don't work at it. However, you have a natural potential. That's why I chose you.
name: Koichiro Oota

quote: Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, and the tomorrow might never come.
name: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: People who are still tormented by their consciences are still worth saving.
name: Akiyama Shinichi

quote: That's people for you. Trusting one another, helping one another- it's all a fantasy. Humans are creatures that will always betray.
name: Yokoya Norihiko

quote: Why do I want to win so much...? Everyone takes up soccer for different reasons. But we all have a passion for the sport... That drive carries us through a game, even if we lose. If we win, it pushes us forward to the next game. The winners of the game honour the losers by playing with everything they have... and until we hit a wall, until a better team beats us, we should try our best, instead of running away. That's what I want to do!
name: Shō Kazamatsuri

quote: I want to reply with a long message, but if it's too long, that might be kind of revolting. But if it's too short, then I might come off as cold instead. Feeling apprehensive of what to do, I decided to reply back with a similar word count instead. This was what they called "mirroring" in psychology. By emulating the actions of the other party, your affection levels would increase!
anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
name: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: A road is something that you make yourself.
name: Jotaro Kujo

quote:
If what I wished for was granted to me, if what I wanted was given to me. Then, as I thought, I wouldn't wish for anything nor want anything. Because the things you were granted and the things you were given were surely shams that would one day be lost. 

The things you wished for had no shape and the things you wanted were untouchable. Or possibly, they might be the most wonderful treasures that would become nothing if you were to touch them.
anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
name: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote:
It' because you were embarrassed, frustrated, bitter, and jealous. If there's a time when those ill feelings surfaced, then there's also going to be a time where you restrained yourself, smiled, and then cut your relationships afterwards.

Being aware of your eventual break up was a rather complicated thing. If you wanted to graduate with a smile, shouldn't you avoid approaching your friends too much? And that's where having no friends was super convenient!
anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
name: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I don't think I'll learn anything if I don't try to do something about it on my own.
name: Hishiro Chizuru

quote: If you've got energy to spend on feeling guilty, then use it to show your gratitude.
name: Yuuji Kazami

quote: To realize a mistake. To not lie. To love one another. To not kill. Those are very simple things, but these times won't allow for them. There is no green on this planet, even though we want it... though we want it so badly. A place where we can live peaceful days with no wars nor stealing. A sacred place where people can live as people. Yes there, that place is called Paradise.
name: Vash the Stampede

quote: Compared to failing without even trying, I'd rather take action, even at the risk of a mistake.
name: Yuuji Kazami

quote: No matter what you're doing, the most essential thing is to not give up. Fail as many times as it takes. Keep trying persistantly untill you can call yourself 'avarage'. If you can collect a nice group of avarage-level skills, that's already above-avarage. You've created your own sort of 'talent'.
name: Yuuji Kazami

quote: It's easy to say "choose so that you'll have no regrets," but that's impossible. No matter how hard you've agonized over your path, you'll always regret something about it later. That's just how we humans are made. Which is why I think our true feelings are important. If you choose your path based on your true feelings, it'll hurt just a little less when you feel the same regret, right?
anime: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
name: Glenn Radars

quote: Someone told me this: "Nothing is "forever" in human relationships". That might be true, but it sounds awfully lonely. But I realized today... If there really is no such thing as "forever"... Then having someone important is the happiest thing one can attain in life.
name: Yukino Miyashita

quote: Instead of judging others based on rumors and gossip articles, I must look and feel for myself. You cannot know anyone without coming face-to-face with them.
name: Haine Wittgenstein

quote: If at some point in life, you made a mistake or keep failing over and over again, and you can't help but think it's useless and you're a good for nothing; Remember, you're only taking a detour. And I'm sure further along your path will come a day where you think, "It was a good life experience". That's why it'll be fine.
name: Hishiro Chizuru

quote: Success is harder than failure for many things in this world.
name: Osamu Dazai

quote: You're wrong. It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it. Yes, some ghouls walk a path that leaves sorrow in their wake, but just like humans, we can choose a different path altogether. We have a lot to learn, both your kind and mine. We need to stop fighting, and start talking. Because when it comes to the state of the world, you can't point your finger at ghouls or humans. We're all to blame.
name: Kaneki Ken

quote: Even if we walk on different paths, one must always live on as you are able! You must never treat your own life as something insignificant! You must never forget the friends you love for as long as you live! Let bloom the flowers of light within your hearts.
name: Erza Scarlet

quote: There is no such thing as truth in this world. That is our reality. Anyone can become a God or a Devil. All it takes is for someone to claim that to be the truth.
name: Eren Kruger

quote: Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!
name: Itachi Uchiha

quote: People's lives don't belong to anyone. Anyone, except themselves. But people have a path. The path of how to use that life.
name: Ei Sei

quote: Unfortunately, I don't have a nice eyeball like you, that can see this and that. All I can do to pursue one thing in front of me. So whether it's the abyss of death or an empty void, I won't fight for the manju offered to my grave. I'll fight for tomorrow's breakfast. That's all.
name: Gintoki Sakata

quote: You shouldn't judge something without trying it first. Having a variety of experiences is what makes life worth living.
anime: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
name: Leticia Draculair

quote: Well it's not like the world is full of sunshine and daisies. If society was only shaped by the view that one must be happy-go-lucky all the time, Hollywood wouldn't make tear-jerking movies, would they?
anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.
name: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: There isn't anything that's evil to everyone. Even the worst evil saves something. On the other hand, even the greatest good hurts someone. The phrase "There are no absolutes in this world" means there isn't any absolute good or absolute evil.
name: Rouka Numachi

quote: Being angry consumes energy and makes me tired. So I'd rather apologize, even if I'm not at fault. Besides, we get along, and we both want to stay friends. Prolonging an awkward situation out of stubbornness is just silly.
name: Tanaka

quote: You're absolutely right. I can't do anything alone.  Everyone has their flaws and imperfections, but that's what drives us to work together... To make up for those flaws. Together, we make the perfect main character.
name: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Miracles are illusions caused by insufficient observation and understanding. They're just... glorious misunderstandings.
name: Tanya Degurechaff

quote: Smile. Not for anyone else, but for yourself. Show yourself your own smile. You'll feel better then.
name: Rintarou Tatewaki

quote: Every day, the words cross my mind.  "If I had done this back then..." but they don't take the sincere form of regret.  The words are just an excuse that come to my mind then disappear.
name: Satoru Fujinuma

quote: I'd talk, but... I fell into the habit of not saying what I really felt, somewhere along the way. And then I started believing that there wasn't anything... that I really wanted to tell anyone.
name: Sakagami Takumi

quote: It's not like people only look for help by saying "please help me." In similiar vein, it's not like you're only in love with someone if you say "I love you." Everyone has things they can't say on impulse.
name: Meme Oshino

quote: Pride is an eminent trait, but too much will cause arrogance. That is when it becomes disgusting.
name: Duke Tōgō

quote: It's not like something is going to happen because I believe in it.  Sometimes you end up worse off because you believed in something too much. There are times it's tough to believe in something.
name: Eureka

quote: I intended to listen to your voice, but it really was nothing but intentions. It's pretty obvious, huh? Of course there's more going on than what people choose to tell you... But I convinced myself that was all there is to a person. I knew that, but still I interpreted the stuff I didn't understand about you in ways convenient for me... That's just how I am.
name: Shouya Ishida

quote: Today might be the chance to grasp the chance to let your talent bloom. Maybe tomorrow, the day after, or next year... Maybe even when you're thirty. I'm not sure if physique has anything to do with it, but if you think that it will never come, it probably never will.
name: Tooru Oikawa

quote: Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams. They way I think of it, literature allows the reader's consciousness to deeply relish the author and be closer to him. And so, we freely walk around the world of the story from the yarn spinner's point of view. It's only when you immerse yourself in the world of a book that you are able to forget just who you are.
name: Shuu Tsukiyama

quote:
The universe has a beginning, but no end. — Infinity.
Stars, too, have their own beginnings, but their own power results in their destruction. — Finite.
It is those who possess wisdom who are the greatest fools. History has shown us this.
You could say that this is the final warning from God to those who resist.
name: Okabe Rintarou

quote: Simplicity is the easiest path to true beauty.
name: Handa Seishū

quote: Stop pitying yourself. Pity yourself, and life becomes an endless nightmare.
name: Osamu Dazai

quote: For a pregnant woman to give birth, she's gotta feel the pain of pulling a watermelon out of her nostril. For an Artist to create a masterpiece, he's gotta feel the pain of pulling entire galaxies out  of his ass.
name: Gintoki Sakata

quote: You can only become friends by talking to people and finding out whether you get along.
name: Shougo Kiryuu

quote: Anything I would never want to lose is always lost. It is a given that everything that is worth wanting will be lost the moment I obtain it. There's nothing worth pursuing at the cost of prolonging a life of suffering.
name: Osamu Dazai

quote: The two of us aren't so different. My whole life I've desired from others. I felt bitter to the people around me and I closed off my heart...and a heart that lets nothing in..will become empty before you realize it. But in this world, you'll sometimes meet meddlesome people who will, even without asking, give you the love you need. And for someone like you or me, meeting such a person is very blissful.
name: Mei Aihara

quote: You can become happy right now." I won't say these types of absurd lies. However, if you get through these current hardships and survive - a time where you can be happy will come.
name: Shin Woo Baek

quote: It may be hard right now... But you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this: What is there... that still remains to you?!
name: Jinbei

quote: A castle that vanishes at the first gust of wind is worthless. A skyscraper within your mind will never fall down.
name: Satsuki Kiryuuin

quote: What's important is not what's right, but what we believe is right.
anime: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky
name: Escha Malier

quote: Unlike in manga and anime, in real life, no heroes can save you when you're down.
name: Minako Kanou

quote: Even if everyone in the whole world dies, I won't care, as long as my beloved survives.
name: Shinra Kishitani

quote: I believe the difference between those up there and me is the question of whether you have given up or not.
name: Ja Wangnan

quote: People don't kill people, really. Monsters do. Monsters like war, hungry nobles, and greedy kingdoms. And monsters like me, not you.
anime: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes
name: Ryner Lute

quote: Our lives become a reality through the most meticulous calculations. Doing our best to continue living is a resolution ingrained in all of us. And this shapes the right future for us. You could say it is life’s greatest mystery. I want to observe the destination reached by the many lives that are created.
name: Akari

quote: This world offers no guarantees for the future.
name: Jun'ichi Hoshiyama

quote: It's times like this that I wish I could come up with an appropriate response.  I hate myself for not being able to reply properly.
name: Takashi Natsume

quote:
Leaving my mother's body, for the first time I learned the chill of cold air and the warmth of human hands.
Cradled by my father and carried out of that room, for the first time, I learned the extent of the
sky and the vast expanse of the world.  Stepping off my everyday path, I learned my own laugh
which I'd never yet heard. Beyond...Beyond this planet..To learn what I still don't know. One more step beyond...
Closer to you.
name: Kou Ichinomiya

quote: And the one person who I thought understood me was just using me all along. No one ever treated me as an equal. Adults are all trash. They didn't listen when I said that it hurt. They didn't listen when I told them to stop. They didn't listen to anything I said!
name: Chris Yukine

quote: That’s just the way it is. Change is inevitable. Instead of resisting it, you’re better served simple going with the flow.
name: Kyouraku Shunsui

quote: Man fears death and yet, at the same time, man is drawn to death. Death is endlessly consumed by men in cities and in literature. It is a singular event in one's life that none may reverse. That is what I desire.
name: Osamu Dazai

quote: While it takes time to recover from the loss of a loved one, having an opportunity to take your mind off things helps too.
name: Yogi

quote: The root of all your evil is in always relying on one of your other possibilities to get your wish. You must accept that you are the person here, now, and that you cannot become anyone else other than that person.
name: Higuchi Seitarou

quote: No matter how careful your risk hedging is, there will still be holes in your plan! Realizing them and making sure that they are promptly dealt with, is the duty of those who stand at the top.
name: Reiji Akaba

quote: Smiles are what connect people! It allows them to communicate through their souls! Souls that are connected... Will never lose to power that only relies on control!
name: Yuzu Hiiragi

quote: Your god is a fragment of your imagination from your weakness.
name: Twenty-Fifth Baam

quote: I have no idea what you really want, what you're really thinking, or what the right thing to do really is. But I'm your friend. Let me stay.
name: Takeo Gouda

quote: Anyway, here's my point. Trivial setbacks like yours and mine are nothing but common occurrences in everyday life! Getting hung up over pointless crap like that shows that you're a joke! A complete and utter joke!
name: Seiya Kanie

quote: Remember that a sword held by someone who is about to die… will never be able to protect anything.
name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Life isn't about counting all the things you've lost, It's about increasing the number of important things in it.
name: Tsukamoto Tsukushi

quote: Jojo, being human means having limits. I've learned something. The more carefully you scheme, the more unexpected events come along
name: Dio Brando

quote: Do not live bowing down. You must die standing up.
name: Shigekuni Yamamoto-Genryusai

quote: Evil is when you use the weak for your own gain and crush them under your foot.
name: Jotaro Kujo

quote: Are you afraid? You don’t want to die, do you? Not just Abarai, if anyone… acts upon the thought of not wanting you to die, you will suddenly begin to fear your impending death, right?
name: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Courage must know fear and make fear its own! Fear upsets breathing! Conquer fear and your breath will never fail you! Hamon breathing comes from courage! A good human is a brave human! Courage is a marvel of humanity!
name: William A. Zeppeli

quote: A city far away from my homeland.  There, after becoming acquainted with strangers, have I changed, perhaps?  That uncontrollable impulse I harbored within me...Has it faded away now, I wonder? What exactly am I doing here in this city?
name: Vorona

quote: Each one of them has something to improve. Victory doesn't come from technique or power alone. In the end, what's needed is a heart that won't give up. The only question is -- Do they have what it takes to push beyond their limits?
name: Soujuu Matsushita

quote: Have a dream that you can achieve within your lifetime!
name: Ryou

quote: Old techniques created by others will never be your own. Only what you create and experience for yourself can become your own.
name: Oubu

quote: All the people I saw from my cage...All the things I saw from my cage, that was the whole world to me. At first, all I could sense was the hostility of the people looking at me from outside...And their feelings of fear. Piercing gazes, hurled stones, whips, sticks...Everything outside the cage was frightening, a source of pain...But eventually I began to realize something. I began to see their other emotions, not just their hostility and fear of me. They were the emotions of families, lovers, and friends who came to the sideshow...Emotions meant for each other.
anime: Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall
name: Kuklo

quote: Don’t hesitate to cut the enemy. Don’t falter to finish them off. Much less heal their wounds. That’s unspeakable, nino. Leave the chocolate here. Become a demon, nino. As strong as a demon. As wicked as a demon. You have to learn that the only way to stand up against ruthlessness, is to become ruthless yourself.
name: Dordonii Alessandro Del Socacchio

quote: I want everyone to feel safe again soon...I want this to be a world where people can without fighting each other.
name: Hange Zoe

quote: Those three are best friends.  They have their respective secrets.  And they're deliberately trying not to give themselves away.  But neither Orihara or Shizuo had any secrets whatsoever.  And that resulted in the complete opposite kind of personal relationship.
name: Shinra Kishitani

quote: You are fighting out of obligation, not out of hatred. You will never reach me like that. Battle without hatred is like a bird without wings. You’ll never defeat anyone like that. You powerless friends are just weights that will break your legs.
name: Aizen Sousuke

quote: You see, I really hate the word "responsibility" saying something or doing something "it's your responsibility" "take responsibility" making a "selection" always comes with "responsibility." That's why I abandoned "selection" therefore, I don't have to bear any responsibility anymore.
name: Kuruwa Kimiharu

quote: You cannot go into battle believing you will lose.
name: Akisame Koetsuji

quote: I'll give you some wise words, Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork.
name: Ikta Solork

quote: Don’t be so stuck-up. Just enjoy this! Killing and being killed. They are just a way to pass time.
name: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Sometimes things go badly, even if nobody really did anything wrong.
name: Kouhei Inuzuma

quote: It doesn't make a difference whether you have a talent or not. I mean, that isn't the end goal. You have greater freedom than we do. All I have are games. But you can go anywhere and become anything.
anime: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen
name: Chiaki Nanami

quote: You guys sure are a worthless bunch. If you wanna wallow in your tears, save it for after you've done everything you can!
name: Seiya Kanie

quote: Who wouldn't want their friends to be happy? That's just normal, man. It's nothing amazing.
name: Makoto Sunakawa

quote: As a human, what kind of achievements will you leave behind?  I bet you'll leave behind a legacy as a psychotic killer, and that thrills me!
name: Izaya Orihara

quote: Charging from the front isn't the only way to cross a wall. If pushing doesn't work, why not try pulling? Try thinking from the opposite direction, you might be able to find a new way out.
name: Kou Kazamatsuri

quote: i'm on a little boat. I'm going against the current of the river, downstream to upstream. If you want something more, you move forward with all your might. If you try to stop, you fall behind. Humans can never stop moving. If they do not yearn for something... Right! Nothing begins without action! You gain nothing if you do nothing! Satisfaction is stagnation! Stagnation is death! I want to know! See! Feel! Experience! Understand! This monster is amazing, but we know nothing about him! This monster strength was amazing. He won every battle he fought! The ultimate soldier! Now it's a war between vampires? I have to thank the Servamp of Melancholy! In every era, wars have created progress!
name: Johannes Mimir Faustus

quote: In some ways, the more one thinks, the closer one feels to getting the answer...but in the end, it's hard to tell what is really the safe answer. I started to dislike being like that at one point, and my motto is, "make quick decisions and act fast." I choose the first answer that feels "right" to me.
name: Shirasagi Yuki

quote: Let those who seek death find it.
name: Father Willibald

quote: Having everything handed to you on a silver platter doesn't necessarily equate to happiness. There are too many choices that you don't even want...
name: Takane Saibara

quote: We need to stop living for others. From now on...Let's live for ourselves!!
name: Historia Reiss

quote: I love fighting, but even more than that, I hate losing! I only fight to win!!
name: Thorkell

quote: After everything I've faced.... Having a future with you snatched away from me ...is definitely the most terrifying thing I've ever had to endure....
name: Gajeel Redfox

quote: Love. I myself have never loved another person.  Most likely, I don't even love myself.  I do have knowledge of it.  But I am incapable of determining whether or not it is vital in my life.
name: Vorona

quote: It's a battle of life and death, and I'm still alive! So I'm not going to give up, and I'll keep living. I'll keep living until I die.
name: Haruhiro

quote: In order to achieve something there are some things that you have to be unsatisfied with in the first place. Having a complex is the source to greatness.
name: Takane Saibara

quote: If I'm not at my limit, means I'm not trying as hard as I can!
name: Naru

quote: There are only so many lives I can value. And...I decided who those people were six years ago. So...You shouldn't try to ask for my pity. Because right now, I don't have...Time to spare or room in my heart.
name: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: Kill me. Make it quick. I no longer have the strength left in me to even walk. If you do not cut me down now, then this will go unsettled for eternity.
name: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: If there's any possibility that I might visit this city again...Then I challenge you to a duel.  I wish to speak with you head-on, to within an inch of my life...To actually experience the joy of existing in this world...that is my desire.
name: Vorona

quote: Well, if they're dead, then that's the end of it. Crying about it gets you nothing but an empty stomach
name: Ylva

quote: We fall into a routine and make careless mistakes because of that. Maybe it'd be good for us to have some excitement or be under pressure once in a while.
name: Haruhiro

quote: Wealth is a nightmare. With each coveted thing we buy, we lose a thing we dream about.
name: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quote: I want to survive...And see her again. As a person, I'm really lower than shit...But she knows that, and she smiles kindly at me anyway.
name: Ymir

quote: You are human, are you not? You are allowed to make mistakes.
name: Bishamonten

quote: Love provides the worth of everything in the world. Without love...gold, silver, horses, and women...all are worthless.
name: Father Willibald

quote: A true hero is a sage with a clean heart, a fake hero is a fool with an ignoble heart. The sage will be saved and the fool will be punished.
name: Blue Owl

quote: Okay. I will protect all of you. I will never let another friend die.
name: Mary

quote: I'm a coward. But I wanted to stay by your side. The truth is I was so happy to hear that you needed me, I took advantage of your words. But you're crying again, because of me. I'm no blessed vessel. I'm just a piece of junk. I was supposed to guide you, but this was the only way I knew how.
name: Kazuma

quote: You keep your nerves on edge and you're always ready to lash out. You distance yourself from everyone. It's because you are afraid of people. YOU are the weakest person in this village.
name: Takuan Sōhō

quote: Not all people in prison are criminals
anime: Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall
name: Cardina Baumeister

quote: If all life is so important, then the most evil of all beings on this earth are without a doubt humans. If there weren't any people on earth, the environment and conditions that all living things live in would be drastically better. Even if there were no school to teach us the stuff we know, it would still be obvious to everyone, wouldn't it? Just think of all that's happened to the earth due to our desires and ego.
name: Kai

quote: There's no master who deliberately lets his birds escape from his birdcage
name: Blue Owl

quote: Yeah, we've become friends. When you're in the same party, there will be times when things don't go smoothly, when you get angry, and when you fight. But they really are your precious friends. It doesn't matter why you became friends, but that you are friends at this moment.
name: Haruhiro

quote: Doesn't it ever get boring always being on the winning side?
name: Thorkell

quote: You asked me if I was ready to carry on. In all honesty, I am not sure of myself. But there is something that must be done now. And I will do it.
name: Bishamonten

quote: Yhwach. You desired a world... Where fear would no longer be a burden. But... In a world without fear of death... People will never attain the hope that is to be found from casting their fears aside and preserving through them. While it is true that people can continue to press forward through the simple act of living... That is no way comparable to marching forward in the face of death, while doing their damndest to keep it at bay. That is why... That is why people have given that very march a unique and special name. "COURAGE."
name: Aizen Sousuke

quote: I have no Strength, but I want it all. I have no Knowledge, but all I do is dream. There's nothing I can do, but I struggle in vain
name: Subaru Natsuki

quote: Mongrels though they may be, they're still figures of some slight renown
name: Gilgamesh

quote: So you want to die honorably? You are being selfish. Each and every person you killed had his own life. Whether that life was blessed or not ... everyone is born into this world ... they grow up ... some people have family ... some are alone in this world ... some have young children ... some are engaged ... some have pets ...some people have high hopes and great dreams ... other have no ambition at all and you ended everything for them Takezo
name: Takuan Sōhō

quote: You are calm and intelligent, but youth can invite disaster. Do not fight alone.
name: Dr. Kuseno

quote: People need to be told they're worthy of being alive by someone else or they can't go on.
name: Atsushi Nakajima

quote: How can you work so hard? There might be something really bad waiting for you ahead. How can you still make yourself move on despite that? The older we get...the number of annoying and troublesome things we have to face only increases- and wonderful things stop happening. In the days ahead of us... we have to bear each painful thing one at a time, conquering them...overcoming them...the power to do that just doesn't spring out of me. The power to move ahead.
name: Kai

quote: "Selection" is important. Even in life. Living, dying, killing are all the results from your selection. Bad luck? Poor fortune? Poor judges of character? You're wrong. It's a selection error for not thinking thoroughly and choosing the answer without proper consideration.
name: Blue Owl

quote:
Waiting for you. Waiting for your knock. The only thing that stands between us is a single door. Shining
my shoes and placing a piece of eternally fresh bread in my pocket, I prepare for my journey.
When you're ready, just look up at me.  Right now, I'm just waiting for you...Waiting for your knock.
name: Kou Ichinomiya

quote: It's okay to make mistakes. In fact, you should. Making mistakes is how you learn to do it right. Getting a good result isn't the only thing. What matters is that you play your best during the game.
name: Soujuu Matsushita

quote: I understand the pain of losing a comrade. I've experienced it, too. Please do not forget the pain. You will move forward while holding on to that pain. Please treasure the comrades you have now. Once they are gone, they will not return. Usually, you don't realize this until afterwards.
name: Shinohara

quote: I'd had fifteen years to think about him. And I realized that it wasn't a matter of the life or death of flesh. What's important to a warrior is the soul...And where it lies.
name: Thorkell

quote: Surely there must be limits to which one may sink.
name: Gilgamesh

quote: The world...God's divine creation...Is so brimming with love...Yet there is no love in the hearts of men.
name: Canute

quote: Live on and endure the shadows! There is no light for those who do not know darkness.
name: Takuan Sōhō

quote: If you're in a position to save people, you should never even joke like that. My father...The doctor...Would never abandon anyone. He'd never give up on a person's life, even if they tried to throw it away.
name: Hiyori Iki

quote: Look, you.  All this talk about monsters...that's what people have called me ever since I was a kid.  I've snapped and lost sight of everything around me, and I've made trouble for Celty more than once or twice.  Even so, she still heard me out, without interrupting.  And so now it's my turn to hear her out, all right?
name: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: Not all warriors fight on the battlefield with a sword in hand. A sailor makes his living battling the sea
name: Leif Ericson

quote: The more battles we fought, the more our confidence grew. We weren't afraid of anything back then. But the difference between victory and defeat is paper-thin. We didn't realize this and were arrogant.
name: Hayashi

quote: Kings do not become kings by themselves. If the poor raise up together, declaring that they don't want any money, kings will be overthrown. However, poor seek money so that they can become kings themselves. Which in turn only strengthens the position of the current king.
name: Hyoudou Kazutaka

quote: You brake the law and I'll punish you, there is no room for discussion.
name: Gilgamesh

quote: Studying is for people to get the knowledge they need to not screw up in life.
name: Makoto Sunakawa

quote: If you were to be troubled over something as trivial as losing face, then it's better to not have it at all.
name: Fujitora

quote: Where in this world can a sane man be found? We're the same. We're all the same. None of us understands what it means to love all. Or the meaning of life...Or the meaning of death...Or the meaning of our own battles.
name: Canute

quote: The world offers up a choice to live or die. The survival of the fittest that's the only governing law this world recognizes.
name: Gai Tsutsugami

quote: There are days when nothing goes right. There are days when you stumble and fall. There are days when you just want to cry. To cry a lot. To sleep a lot. Or even eat a lot. It's alright, as long as you pick yourself up again.
name: Yuki Takeya

quote: I believe that people have the individual right to decide how they want to live. So whether you just listen to what others say, or get stuck a lot of times...and cause trouble to others, it ultimately comes back to yourself.
name: Shirasagi Yuki

quote: I know we can't immediately treat her as part of our group, but if we always think of her as an outsider, she'll never have a chance to become part of our group.
name: Haruhiro

quote: That kid's good point is that he feels he doesn't have much skill. It's this kind of person that will keep on improving.
name: Mizuno Tatsuya

quote: If you hurt me, then so be it. Do you think that there is any human in all the world who has never hurt another? You are all so kind...It hurts you to hurt others. That is why I had been hiding my pain, as well.
name: Bishamonten

quote: Only those who do their jobs on the battlefield get the rewards they desire. That's the life of a warrior.
name: Askeladd

quote: Being strong isn't just about having power or move, it about one's spirit
name: Roronoa Zoro

quote: No matter how many years it's been since they met, brothers are brothers, aren't they? Even without having seen, I can tell.
name: Matahachi Hon'iden

quote: If your failing, then keep trying until you don't.
name: Kintarō Tōyama

quote: Even if there's nothing here today, there might be something tomorrow.  It's a caring heart that's important.
name: Takashi Natsume

quote: People...At least, all children are born into a world that seems unreasonable and crazy to them. No one is asked at birth if they agree to come into the world. Everyone is born that way.
name: Nyanta

quote: Humanity will never stop fighting itself.. until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer.
name: Erwin Smith

quote: These days, I feel more comfortable in dark places.  I look at these shadows as a part of you.  They absorb all the light.  There's no one in the world who has this color but you.
name: Shinra Kishitani

quote: You have no enemies. No one...Has any enemies. There is no one...That you should hurt
name: Thors

quote: It doesn't matter what you were like before. Nobody cares.
name: Haruhiro

quote: Living has it own challenges. I'll give you just one piece of advice. Don't quit. Yes, when you die, you die. But if you give up, you're definitely going to die. That, I am sure of.
name: Brittany

quote: You're fat, slow and sloppy. It's not the outside that counts, but there's a limit to that too.
name: Atsuko Chiba

quote: Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the the most lonely one.
name: Makoto Ōgami

quote: A man's come all the way out to the end of the North to ask for my help. Wouldn't it be rude to wait to hear what he wanted?
name: William Massachusetts

quote: The sorrows of life...To not be able to live like yourself. The joys of life...To be able to die like yourself.
name: Karren von Rosewald

quote: You're young. Time is on your side. You'll grow up and I'll grow old. Someday you'll likely beat me. It's only natural. Even the strongest man must die.
name: Askeladd

quote:
The present isn't everything, but there are things you can only do now, things you can only find here. 
It's now or never. Think, Writhe, Struggle and agonize. If not, what you are going through isn’t genuine.
anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
name: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: Smile. Even if you're facing an enemy, people can't attack others with a smile.
name: Rurumu

quote: Look, all it means is that when I lose it, it's cause things make no sense.  If there was any logic to it, then I wouldn't get pissed even if I got shot or stabbed.
name: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: You mongrels. By our next meeting see that you've culled your numbers. Only a true hero is worthy to look upon my glorious presence.
name: Gilgamesh

quote: A fight you can't win becomes an obsession
name: Askeladd

quote: You taught me what it means to love, and for that I will be eternally grateful.
name: Gajeel Redfox

quote: I'm the one who is grateful. That's because you're all willing to be my friends. For that, I'm grateful.
name: Manato

quote: He may seem cold-blooded, but he's more human and his heart is more brittle than anyone else... so much so that if you filled it with human love or betrayal, it'd break easily... which is why I think he chose to avoid it all from the start: to love humanity. Do you understand? Not to accept it, not to face it, but he chose to avoid it.
name: Shinra Kishitani

quote: They don't know that once you lose something, you can never get it back again.
name: Carly Stratmann

quote: We've never worked together before, so don't worry about teamwork! Just stay out of each other's way. Fight the way you want to fight!
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Bors Elder

quote: I'm a man who makes precise choices about time, place, and people. Pleople call me Master of Choices. I'm gonna be the King of the Choices!
name: Ranta

quote: Even if doesn't alter or change the end result in the slightest, making decisions based on convictions that you believe in and walking your own path has its own merit and worth. There's something to be said for not having... even one regret.
name: Haschwalth Jugram

quote: Those who don't fulfill their obligation to others 'ave no right to ask 'em for such privilege...
name: Mr. Blouse

quote: I don't want to be a loser who can't do anything but talk. I don't want to be somebody who can sacrifice others, but won't risk himself.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Ouka Kashima

quote: If you have enough breath to say you don't have energy, I haven't push you far enough!
name: Barbara

quote: When you're just starting out, put all your energy into surviving. No matter how pathetic you feel, or how people laugh at you, if you come back alive, you win.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Mia Grand

quote: People live on by forgetting their memories. But there are some memories that should never be forgotten.
name: Gendou Ikari

quote: I understand now... What I really need to protect isn't myself, much less my money. It's my pride.
name: Kubota Yoshinobu

quote: As for me, I have a lot of things that I'm not good at and that I need to work on. My comrades make up for those weaknesses by help me out, and maybe that's how we've found a balance in our party.
name: Haruhiro

quote: If someone always follows the perfect path without ever facing hardship... Is it really what's best for that person?
name: Yoake Ryou

quote: Life and death are like light and shadow. They're both always there. But people don't like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.
name: Yato

quote: The only reason I must rely on this sword is because I am imperfect. A true warrior...Needs no sword
name: Thors

quote: Tell me, if you have something more important than your life, and you have to give up your life to protect that, what would you do? In that case, isn't there only one answer? Give up your life.
name: Hwan Sung-Gong

quote: Right now, we're all really only taking it day by day. Even if we can't get used to things, even if we can't win at something, even if we don't have any excess...In order to live day by day, we work, we fail, and we succeed. Sometimes we laugh. For the blessing before our very eyes, for our friends, we're thankful. Who knew that people could feel happiness just from living?
name: Sei

quote: I've continually fought, and with each battle I've been killing my own heart. And my heart has been completely void of feeling for quite a long time now. Maybe my life doesn't have value anymore, but I have to keep on living.
name: Trowa Barton

quote: If you keep on hiding your true feelings, who is going to be happy? If you are sad, you should say it out loud!
name: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: If you don't face each other with honesty, what kind of family is this?
name: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: They'll learn that a man without reason is no different from an animal who defecates wherever it pleases.
name: Marlowe Sand

quote: Once the thread of fate is tangled, it cannot be undone.
name: Kikyo

quote: I can't stand the weak, They're always nervous about when they might next be attacked. They can't trust anybody and they never have an opinion of their own. I can't stand such people.
name: Heero Yuy

quote: Living this way is my way of getting revenge!! I'm going to be living proof that your fate isn't decided at birth!! So what about you?! You're going to kill yourself, the ultimate act of submission. Is that how much you want to please the people who treated you like a nuisance?! Why are you trying to hurt yourself?! If your will is that strong... Then shouldn't you be able to change your fate?!
name: Ymir

quote: Don't try to find a reason for somebody's love!!
name: Sengoku the Buddha

quote: A man, slave to gold, holds a whip...And beats the slave he bought with that gold as if to claim HE is the master. He just doesn't see it for himself. Every living human being is a slave to something
name: Askeladd

quote: Love is more afraid of change than destruction.
name: Akari Koumoto

quote: Just because you want other people to think of you as someone who'd literally die for another... dragging someone else to his death just for that... only a bad girl would do that, right?
name: Ymir

quote: Belief in others is an illusion concocted by the clever to exploit the stupid.
name: Shin Hyuga Shaing

quote: The weather's nice and the breeze feels good. The little birds are making their cute chirping sounds. Perhaps people nowadays have forgotten how wonderful nature is... Yes, don't you think it's a waste to not feel it with your entire body like this?
name: Tanaka

quote: Even in moments of the deepest despair... I guess we can still find hope, huh?
name: Hange Zoe

quote: But... When I lost the whole foundation of my happiness in one instant, I realized that I was the biggest coward in the world.
name: Kaidou Haru

quote: We humans are miserable creatures. We reject what we fear. We attack because we don' t understand. Human cowardice... breeds war.
name: Biba Amatori

quote: If you really want to be strong... Stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you!
name: Saitama

quote: All day, I've had to sit in the stench of cigarettes and alcohol. Every single person I met today was drinking and smoking. If they weren't, they were doing drugs. Well, except for Wayne. I've... had enough of it.
name: Annie Leonhardt

quote: Sometimes you have days like this. Days where the most trivial little thing... Ends up getting you wrapped up in some big, annoying trouble.
name: Annie Leonhardt

quote: (To Ichigo Kurosaki) You are a fool, Ichigo Kurosaki. You willingly seek to challenge an opponent so much more powerful than you that it strikes a primal fear into your being. Incomprehensible. If this is the work of the 'heart' that you people speak of, then it is because you possess this 'heart' that you humans bring hurt upon yourself, because you possess this 'heart' that you lose your lives
name: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Even if all we accomplished were small steps forward... We continued to give our lives if it meant that one day... humanity would be free from this terror.
name: Hange Zoe

quote: Going against the flow... takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid, but... Well... What I'm sure of is that people like that are rare. So you can't call them common. You can't call them normal, either. People like you... get called special.
name: Annie Leonhardt

quote: Man or Child, Strong or Weak, None of those matter once you are out at sea!
name: Usopp

quote: The world won't always go the way you want it to. Better not take it to seriously.
name: Kubard

quote: The one who holds power has no self-awareness of his responsibilities and the one aware of the responsibilities has no power at all.
name: Arslan

quote: Zealotry and prejudice more than anything, bring harm to the people of the land.
name: Arslan

quote: Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.
name: Madara Uchiha

quote: The chains of fear are easily broken with the blade of courage.
name: Goltas

quote: To force obedience by the sword now will only invite bloody rebellion later.
name: Hakuei Ren

quote: The  pain on these wounds will last only a second. The pain of your death would last a lifetime.
name: Kenshiro

quote: The Killer instinct is not perceived by words, but by look
name: Gantz

quote: Yeah, so I don’t appear to be the brightest crayon in the box but I still look down on the rest of the world.
name: Kei Kurono

quote: Still I've never thought of myself as an unfortunate person. Of course I am not a fortunate person either. In the first place a fortunate person could never write plays or novels. I write while loving my misfortune almost as if I'm tasting it.
name: Takada

quote: You can't just erase people's feelings. It's as if my emotions were lost somewhere hundreds of miles away. It's as if they were sent long ago, in a letter that was always intended for me.
name: Wolfgang Grimmer

quote: Hope is harmony. A just heart, moving toward the light. That is all. Despair is hope's polar opposite. It is messy and confusing. Despair swallows up love, hatred, and everything else. Because not knowing where you will end up is despair. Despair is what even you cannot predict. Only despair's unpredictability will save you from a boring future.
anime: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen
name: Junko Enoshima

quote: My new family is just so kind. It's almost if there's been some kind of mistake... like, I'll have to pay back for all this happiness later on.
name: Nao Yasumori

quote: What must be done... Must be done. No matter what. Complete your mission. You were born into this world so that you could complete your mission.
name: Annie Leonhardt

quote: Even if they're only a year older, shouldn't we respect and serve our elders?
name: Sakamoto

quote: It seems like we spent a long time together, but it wasn't. It was actually pretty short. Too short. So I kind of know, but I kind of don't know what I want to say. He was friendly, easy to talk to, and smart. He could do anything and was reliable. I thought he was perfect. But maybe I just didn't realize what his faults were. He might have been hiding his flaws.
name: Haruhiro

quote: Pray not for the future. Rely not on the future or the past. Just stay in the Now.
name: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: Normally, as people love and are loved, they feel happiness. When I am hated by people, that is when I feel happiness. And then I want to tear apart and inflict unimaginable harm to the things I love. But is that really all that strange, I wonder?
name: Pariston Hill

quote: I actually don't think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things... and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction.
name: Itachi Uchiha

quote: I think I finally understand... As long as there's someone who'll grieve, it's wrong to want to die.
name: Hidehito Nomura

quote: So now we know her past. So what? It doesn't have anything to do with us. We have to be nice to her just because she's had a rough past? You've got to be kidding.
name: Ranta

quote: A hero must be tough, strong and beautiful... As well as able to promptly and splendidly eradicate evil.
name: Sweet Mask

quote: So long as I don't give up, the possibility of winning will never fall to zero.
name: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: This blank space represents infinite potential. One day, it may become anything.
name: No Game No Life

quote: Youmu or Spirit Warrior... In the end, none of that really matters. Nor does the question of who you are. All that matters is to be close to the ones you care about.
anime: Gekijou-ban Kyoukai no Kanata -I'll Be Here- Mirai-hen
name: Yayoi Kanbara

quote: People only find me interesting because they can't tell whether I'm serious or not.
name: Killua Zoldyck

quote: Nobody knows what will happen in the future. Something even better might happen tomorrow.
name: Haruhiro

quote: If you ask what life is to me, I'd answer endless days of homework and pain. Why you ask? The amount of homework, it's too much.
name: Han Jee-Han

quote: Mankind is a very intresting species.
name: Sakamoto

quote: People cannot show each other their true feelings. Fear, suspicion, and resentment never subside.
name: Madara Uchiha

quote: Even if mistaken, even if cruel, even if stupid, if many people acknowledge it, I found out that it can become the right thing. I found out that righteousness was able to be infinitely mass-produced. I found out that righteousness was established by the number of people. I found out that maneuvering for a majority was everything.
name: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Those painful memories are what help us make it to tomorrow and become stronger.
name: Erza Scarlet

quote: I can't forgive myself. I wanted something to happen without doing anything myself! I have to do it. I have to do it all... Or I can't even stand by her side!
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Bell Cranel

quote: If there's something you want to go through with, you should stick to it without keeping up appearances.
name: Arato Hisako

quote: I'm here because I don't like to be tied down. So you should decide for yourself who you want for your friend.
name: Hayabusa Shou

quote: Why do we have to be okay being friends with someone who won't treat us as friends?
name: Ranta

quote: Humility is a virtue, but do not insult yourself.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Ryu Lion

quote: (To Ichigo Kurosaki) Do not allow yourself to be shaken. Do not weaken your stance. Open your senses. And do not let your guard down for an instant.
name: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: I hate, hate, HATE everyone. But that’s okay. I can use my screams to blow them all away. I’m sure dead people are a lot easier to deal with.
name: Crona

quote: Don't you think forcing people to help with something pointless is far more cruel?
name: Fukase

quote: You have yet to see what form your soul has taken. That's what it actually means when you claim that you lack joy in your life.
name: Gilgamesh

quote: What do you think about your world? Is it fun? Is it easy to live in?
name: Tet

quote: I am looking at things from a much higher perspective than you. I observe this world, this universe, the truth of all things. And I have come to realize that humanity must be destroyed. Out of all which the Gods have made, humans are their sole failure. They are a disease that must be vanquished. A filth that must be cleansed. They have no place here, in this universe, and if I am to make it a utopia once more, then I must take upon the grand task of removing humanity forever, in place of the Gods who refuse to admit their mistake.
name: Goku Black

quote: You said that she's no different from us, right? So if we don't try to get to know her, she won't try to get to know us either. If we don't treat her as a friend, she won't treat us as her friends either, right?
name: Haruhiro

quote: When you aim to reach high places, you may find yourself on narrow footing and feel disheartened. And then your confidence will falter, and you will find it ever harder to believe in yourself. If you ever feel that you can't believe in yourself, please believe in your friends.
name: Sakamoto

quote: Well, singing, or music... I think by nature it was always meant to convey something. So if there's something you want to say, don't you think you should try singing it?
name: Sakagami Takumi

quote: You're not a strong person, so you can really understand how weak people feel. I mean... Most humans are weak, including me... But if I got an order from someone who saw things like I do, no matter how tough it was, I'd do my damnedest to carry it out.
name: Marco Bodt

quote: We should be driven by things like our desires, instincts, and impulses. That's how it should be.
name: Ranta

quote: No matter how much despair awaits them, I wish that at the end of their story, the gentle light of hope will shine on them...
name: Xerxes Break

quote: Looking back on the past is a dangerous thing. It's nothing more than an attachment.
name: Fukase

quote: After today, tomorrow will come again. Maybe I've been taking that for granted. But now... It's not easy, huh...
name: Haruhiro

quote: There are times we can't run away, no matter how bad the odds are. When the people we're supposed to protect are threatened, we have to enter the fray and shield them. And it doesn't matter who or what the enemy is. We need to master skills and get stronger, with artillery as well as hand-do-hand combat. I think that's our responsibility as strong soldiers.
name: Reiner Braun

quote: Listen, girls like guys who are strong and can protect them. So if you keep working hard and get stronger, she just might like you back.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Eina Tulle

quote: Don't tell people to disappear like it's nothing! Words can hurt people! You can't ever take them back! Even if you regret it, you can never take them back!
name: Naruse Jun

quote: The government is the sails, the people the wind, and the time the sea. As long as there is people to repair the ship, it can be used forever.
name: France

quote: However rough the waters in the outside world may be, to find your own lighthouse and swim for it is only logical, isn't it?
name: Hayabusa Shou

quote: Everybody has things they aren't good at or can't do. We cover each other's weakness. That's what a party's for.
name: Manato

quote: You're only resorting to physical abuse because you can't prove that I'm wrong.
name: Armin Arlelt

quote: In the end, guilt is just the question of whether you're capable of forgiving yourself or not. If you've really changed, then prove it with your actions.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Hestia

quote: If you think too hard when you don't have a brain, you're going to hurt your head.
name: Tooru Oikawa

quote: The many lives lost during long years of conflict... because of those selfless sacrifices, we are able to bathe in peace and prosperity now. To ingrain this history within the new generation will be a vital cog in helping to maintain the peace.
name: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: At times, you will probably lose sight of your life goals, as well. When that happens, instead of panicking, why not try indulging in a hobby? Then a new, or perhaps an old, goal might grow stronger, and stronger, into a rousing fortissimo.
name: Sakamoto

quote: The lesson you need to learn right now, can't be taught with words... only with action.
name: Levi Ackerman

quote: Are our enemies the kobolds? No, our real enemies are our overly weak selves.
name: Haruhiro

quote: I wanted to save you because you're you. I didn't want you to leave, because you're you. I can't find another reason. I don't need another reason to save you.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Bell Cranel

quote: If you're gonna hit it, hit it until it breaks!
name: Tooru Oikawa

quote: All of the Arrancar follow me... because they see me as fearless and the only individual who can actually bring forth the new world... the new future where you can belong. Without me, that dream can't be fulfilled and without me the gotei 13 will destroy you all...  Do you see it now from my point of view?
name: Aizen Sousuke

quote: A hero is not the one who never falls. He is the one that who gets up, again and again, never losing sights of his dreams.
name: Rock Lee

quote: If I have to win through underhanded means, I'd rather just stand right here until I die.
name: Hayabusa Shou

quote: Don't sweat the small stuff. You'll only tire yourself out.
name: Ranta

quote: I think there are times people have to die... even if I don't like it.
name: Armin Arlelt

quote: If you think unconditional kindness is good, and any sort of kindness that comes with conditions is hypocrisy, you should reconsider. People can only achieve as much as the situation allows.
name: Ikta Solork

quote: Don't make yourself weigh your pride against your friends.
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Hephaestus

quote: After being driven out of the orphanage, I had nothing to eat, nowhere to sleep, and, as one might expect, not a cent to my name. Yet, I lack the courage to commit theft. That is how I've arrived at my current predicament... However... if I wish to live, I have no choice but to steal and take from others!
name: Atsushi Nakajima

quote:
On a Monday, God created the world. 
On Tuesday, God drew the line between Order and Chaos. 
On Wednesday, God arranged each and every number. 
On Thursday, God permitted the ebb and flow of Time. 
On Friday, God explored every nook and cranny of the world. 

On Saturday, God rested. 
And on Sunday, God... 
forsook the world.
name: Ai Astin

quote: There's no such thing as a painless lesson, they just don't exist. Sacrifices are necessary, you can't gain something without losing something first... Although if you can endure that pain and walk away from it, you'll find that you now have a heart strong enough to overcome any obstacle... Yeah... A Fullmetal Heart.
name: Edward Elric

quote: Maybe worrying about the future partings so much that you miss out on happiness in the present is a waste.
name: Hishiro Chizuru

quote: A good book is always good, no matter how many times you’ve already read it.
name: Osamu Dazai

quote: Adults say you shouldn't do things half-heartedly. But in reality, you can get by with doing just that. Of course, it would be great to stand out. But how many people can live like that? It's really hard to be exceptional.
name: Han Jee-Han

quote: When faced with a decision... At such times, we must choose only one option and it can be very confusing. When that happens, simply using your head and charging straight into the obstacle is a fine option.
name: Sakamoto

quote: A lot of the times, you're going into a situation you know nothing about. So what you need is to be quick to act... and make tough decisions in worst-case scenarios.
name: Levi Ackerman

quote: I now have things that I don't want to forget, and things that I shouldn't forget. And I don't plan to ever forget those things, as long as I live.
name: Haruhiro

quote: When an otaku goes all-out with his mind set on something you better not underestimate him.
name: Tomoya Aki

quote: If I don't stand up here... If I don't reach higher here... When am I ever going to do it?
anime: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
name: Bell Cranel

quote: The fact that you consider yourself as an equal to me, is being arrogant in itself.
name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: I might be the ugly duckling of the group, but I'll make sure that I'll protect all of you with all my might.
name: Zeno

quote: I know that I have no strengths to offer. It irritates me how weak I am. But let me protect them!
name: Yona

quote: The purpose of an alliance is not simply for the sake of preventing an enemy from attacking you. Rather, importance lies in what one can obtain after the alliance. As well as your actions after the alliance.
name: Riboku

quote: Now listen up, any power that surpasses reason, still comes from reason, right? Magic isn't some kind of miraculous power. It is a talent that only works when the flow of energy inside of us and the flow of energy in the natural world are in perfect synchronization. To perform magic one must have a strong mind and the ability to focus. It should take over your being and come pouring out of your soul! If all we do is worry about following rules, then our magic will never progress.
name: Makarov Dreyar

quote: No matter how hurt someone is, they're meant to overcome it and try to go forward.
name: Mirajane Strauss

quote: If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn't have any in the first place.
name: Fujitora

quote: There are wounds that even magic can't heal, but... even though it was painful to hear you talk about it, it was okay. That part was okay.
name: Mary

quote: Accomplishing a shared goal under tense circumstances causes distance between people to naturally close.
name: Sakamoto

quote: If I can't even manage a polite smile, I'll be in trouble in the real world.
name: Hishiro Chizuru

quote: When people are faced with a situation they don't understand, it's easy for fear to take hold.
name: Armin Arlelt

quote: Prophecies don't ever come true.
name: Saitama

quote: If you guys weren't here, I don't know what would have happened to me. You can't live in this world alone, no matter how you look at it.
name: Manato

quote: If you have no money, I believe all you can do is work.
name: Sakamoto

quote: Someday we'll part. Maybe be forgotten. But we're living in the moment. So... make lots of friends, fall madly in love, and enjoy every moment to the fullest.
name: Kaizaki Arata

quote: That's right... This world... is cruel. It hit me that living was like a miracle.
name: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: Heroes and the police don't do their jobs because someone says "please". Right?
name: Saitama

quote: If we had spent more time together, maybe I would have seen another side of him. I wish I knew him more. I wish I knew more about what kind of person he was. I wanted more time. If we had more time, we would've gone through things together. Maybe we would've gotten annoyed at each other and fight. Maybe we would've disliked each other, or liked each other more.
name: Haruhiro

quote: Ant king , you believe I cannot pray with a single arm? A prayer comes from the heart. If the heart achieves the correct form, it becomes emotions and emotions can be manifested.
name: Netero

quote: My name is Dracule Mihawk! Find your self, true world, become stronger! No matter how long it may take, I will wait for you in my strongest form! Surpass this sword! Surpass me! Roronoa Zoro!
name: Dracule Mihawk

quote: What use is strength in modern society? You have to be smart.
name: Han Jee-Han

quote: Donato has to keep proving himself. He wants to prove just how valuable he is. Isn't that the case with you as well? Because you are the same as Donato. All you're doing is indulging in this twisted self-value that you have to yourself. And if you don't, you won't last. Eventually, you will break and become useless. Once that happens, you'll break and become discarded.
name: Kaneki Ken

quote: I wont stop fighting when im tired, i'll stop fighting when you've shattered my heart into a thousand pieces
name: Natsu Dragneel

quote: I want to become a man who treasures his friends.
name: Rogue Cheney

quote: Trust? I hate that word, but coming from you it sounds different.
name: Porco Rosso

quote: I know, someone like me can't just go out and change the world on a whim.
name: Akatsuki Kojou

quote: No matter the reason, I don't think anyone who loses consciousness in the battlefield has any right to survive!
name: Kyoko Mogami

quote: If praying does not work, and words are ineffective... what's left is to fight.
name: Meme Oshino

quote: You probably weren't wrong, but you went about it the wrong way.
name: Akatsuki Kojou

quote: I no longer pay attention to other people’s skills. It doesn’t matter; at the end of the day, you can only do your best.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Usui Haruaki

quote: Ever since I joined the survey corps, I've had people dying on me everyday. But... you understand, don't you? One day or another, everyone you care about eventually dies. It's something we simply can't accept. It's a realization that could drive you insane... It's painful... so painful... I get it. And still... we must keep moving forward.
name: Hange Zoe

quote: Sometimes you have to fight to get your point across.
name: Konno Yuuki

quote: This silence belongs to us... and every single person out there, is waiting for us to fill it with something.
name: Kousei Arima

quote: But being optimistic isn't a bad thing, is it? It's not like you're doing anything bad. It's also not like you're cheating either.
name: Koyomi Araragi

quote: One can evoke "extraordinary" abilities if one focuses all energy on just one point.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Shindo Iroha

quote: I would no longer fight against my feelings because I realized how useless and ineffective it was to fight them.
name: Kyoko Mogami

quote: The vampires don't really care about humanity in general. It's only specific humans like you that concern them... The kind of humans who will stop at nothing to acquire more power.
name: Mikaela Hyakuya

quote: If there's someone you wish to see, then you are no longer alone.
name: Takashi Natsume

quote: But they say a woman is better off with an unloved man, versus a man who loves her.
name: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: You can’t cause a change without some courage and determination.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Usui Haruaki

quote: Humans are pitiful beings, walking forward their backs to the future gazing at the past. This is why they fail to notice the simplest pitfalls and stumble tragically and comically.
anime: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 8: Twilight of the...
name: Frederica Bernkastel

quote: There is no such thing as forever. Everything ends sooner or later. Just as it should. Because now is only now. And this moment... is so precious.
name: Reki

quote: In the end, the best way to live down here is to be smart. You've got to be clever to survive.
name: Mikaela Hyakuya

quote: It's easy for girls to take advantage of your kindness, so be careful.
name: Suruga Kanbaru

quote: There’s no despair that can’t be overcome by everyday life.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Otonashi Maria

quote: It doesn't seem right to let a girl choose me. I would rather choose the girl I devote myself to.
name: Taichi Mashima

quote: Birds with the wind in their wings are flying across the great blue sky right now. And all of you should be able to make it! To the highest limit, to the farthest limit!
name: Ittetsu Takeda

quote: The impostor is an impostor because it can't be distinguished from the real thing. The proof of its falsity is in its resemblance to the real thing.
name: Koyomi Araragi

quote: The purpose of practice is to improve your power. The purpose of the real race is to win.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Shindo Iroha

quote: Sometimes people put up walls, not to keep others out, but to see who cares enough to break them down.
name: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: I don’t put much trust in words like "personality" or "disposition" or "character." Those things all change depending on the situation. Looking at it in the long run, what changes people is what situations they get into. People put a lot of faith in consistency, but it’s something more superficial than most people think.
name: Kusonoki

quote: I believe that love is much deeper than that. It’s much more irreversible. It exceeds just caring for each other and continues until both parties become entangled and inseparable. They combine to form a single concept. They become one. Neither of them must come apart. THAT’S LOVE.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Hoshino Kazuki

quote: Haven't you already lifted your foot, preparing to step forward? Then you only have one option! Finish taking that step!
name: Sumire Kanō

quote: Being rivals does not mean being an enemy.
name: Kaizaki Arata

quote: You appearing before me was the best thing that’s ever happened in my life. The worst was when you left my sight. …And depending on your reply now, I might have a new best or worst.
name: Kusonoki

quote: "Because I won’t die if I miss." I can totally understand the words of that slugger. We won’t die just because our dreams and efforts prove futile, nor do we need to despair. We both faced much greater despair, so we aren’t afraid of the obstacles that lie before us. We can easily bet on a coin flip while others are too frightened to even pick heads or tails.
anime: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
name: Usui Haruaki
